{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX7000 |asin=B00R92CLD6 |fcc_date=12/08/2014 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H317 |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY314200280 |ic_id=4054A-14200280 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0, TT1423 P10, 390310-02 B1B; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85309-11;SKY85309-11, UM4GZ, 1414 MY;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85710-11;SKY85710-11, UM4JK, 1414 MY;3; |flags=256QAM, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 Nighthawk WiFi Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX7000.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX7000}} Product page claims a 1GHz dual-core processor but the FCC photos :show a BCM4708A0 which is known to be 800MHz. Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net
